::MEGATRON'S BASE::

The autoguns seace fire as Megastorm leaves the area.  The computer 
scans the area and detects the signatures of two more unidentified 
bots.  It calculates that the two bots are just out of range but aims 
guns at them and will fire when they are in range.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Land Mine and Time Bomb flee. But eventually stop by the Base. This 
was the
> time to prove they are true Predacons. Land Mine and Time Bomb fire 
on the
> attackers of Megatron's base...
